name: BQM: BlockQuest Maker
summary:
Create & Play, instant death dungeon RPG! You can make your own gimmick packed dungeon? And you can share it to the world?
BQM is a simple game maker that gives you both chance to play dungeons designed by other users and to create your original, bewildering one!

name: BQM: BlockQuest Maker - Remastered
summary: Play and create your very own dungeons in BlockQuest Maker: Remastered, a dungeon creator full of all kinds of fun gimmicks!

name: BQM: BlockQuest Maker - 2nd DLC: Cyber Century
BQM: BlockQuest Maker - 1st DLC: Samurai Era
BQM: BlockQuest Maker - Complete Edition
summary: Create & play your very own instant-death dungeon RPG and share it with the world!
